DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess new behavioral intervention help people live HIV/AIDS practice self-management skill . Specifically , want see new educational intervention improve physical activity , sleep , mental wellness quality life HIV ( Human Immunodeficiency Virus ) -infected men woman . We hypothesize intervention group practice self-management skill control group .
DOC.detailed_description: Sample : The study sample include 40 HIV+ men woman . Inclusion criterion include : documented HIV diagnosis ; adult ( 18 year old great ) ; English speaking . Design : The SystemCHANGE-HIV study 15-week , randomize , two-group experimental design include 10-week behavioral intervention . In experimental group , one half participant ( n=20 ) receive intervention ; control group , half participant undergo usual care . Both experimental control group complete psychometric instrument packet , three time , give comparison self-management intervention four-week follow visit . This packet include information medical history , demographic , HIV self-management , physical activity , social support , social capital , mental wellness , quality life.Additionally , participant wear actigraph seven consecutive day , data collection point , assess sleep . Analysis : Preliminary data analysis include descriptive statistic scatter plot examine distribution outcome time point , well covariate interest . Although randomization scheme ensure balance baseline variable two arm ( due chance alone ) , estimate standardize magnitude baseline difference well correlation baseline variable outcome interest 10 week 15 week objectively determine baseline variable need estimate unbiased effect intervention outcome . The primary analysis base intent treat approach investigate effect intervention continuous outcomes 10 week 15 week . In particular , Analysis Covariance model use adjusts treatment arm baseline level outcome variable . Such model allow u estimate effect intervention outcome , adjust baseline outcome.In addition , linear mixed model use determine effect intervention outcome 10 week differs effect intervention outcome 15 week . If need , analysis repeat use as-treated approach . All analysis perform use two-sided significance 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: document HIV diagnosis adult ( 21 year old great ) English speaking
